title: Guilford Courthouse National Military Park: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth         The battlefield at Guilford Courthouse is also a beautiful forest.   Junior Ranger Program Become a Guilford Courthouse Junior Park Ranger! It's hard work, but it's fun.We have two Junior Ranger programs. Junior Ranger work sheets for young visitors under ten years of age and over ten are available at the the battlefield visitor center and the Colonial Heritage Center/Hoskins Farm (Colonial Heritage Center open Friday, Saturday and Sunday only). Allow about two hours to complete all the requirements. Upon completion, Junior Rangers receive an official certificate and badge. Boy Scouts of America Guilford Courthouse Historic Trail Award Cub Scouts can earn a special patch by visiting Guilford Courthouse National Military Park. Boy Scouts can earn a patch and medal by hiking the six-mile Guilford Courthouse Historic Trail. Contact the Old North State Council, BSA, for test sheets and instructions and then call (336) 288-1776, ext. 228, to schedule your den's or troop's park visit. Old North State Council, BSA, is headquartered at 1405 Westover Terrace, Greensboro, NC 27408. Telephone: (336) 378-9166. All awards and patches are available at the Council Headquarters.
